name: Ping's Resume of 2016
body:
# Welcome to my GitHub resume page.

### Profile
Expertise in Frontend and Backend web development,  passion for solving problems, constantly perfecting owncraft, and producing work which can be proud of.

### Summary

### Technical Expertise
>PROFESSIONAL SKILLSET
W3C Validated HTML5
BEM/CSS3 via Sass
jQuery, Javascript
>WORKING KNOWLEDGE
AngularJS
Grunt Automation
MVC frameworks (Sitecore, Umbraco, Codeigniter)
Wordpress
>TOOLS
SublimeText 3
Adobe Creative Suite
Github
Stack Overflow

### Work Experience

We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

Freelance + Consultancy Services (March 2015 - Present)
*  Current building hybrid mobile application with Ionic
*  Familiar with node.js and building tools such as NPM, Grunt, Gulp,SASS
*  Build single page web application with AngularJS and Ionic
*  Develop custom WordPress theme/plugin solutions for the clients
* Create HTML5 games with phaserJS framework
* Create and publish web digital download files for Esty online shop
*  Work on open source projects in spare time
* Great experience in an Agile  development environment


Web Developer at Isobar Canada (March 2013 - February 2015)
* Build single page web application with AngularJS and NodeJS
* Familiar with node.js and building tools such as NPM, Grunt, Gulp,SASS
* Integrated responsive and modern web technologies to build engaging and 
   highly - visible product and marketing web pages for Mackenzie Investments, Mattel, Corby Brands, Canadian Art.
* Created mobile-first user experiences, focusing on performance, modularity and responsive design principles.
* Created and maintained hyper-targeted email campaigns for large-profile businesses    using Exacttarget and MailChimp.
* Great experience in an Agile  development environment




Contractor at Isobar Canada (July 2012 - February 2013)
* Integrated responsive and modern web technologies to build engaging and 
   highly - visible product and marketing web pages for Mackenzie Investments, Canadian Art.


Front-End Web Developer (Contractor) at Pitney Bowes Business Insight
March 2012 - June 2012, Contracted through Robert Half Technology
* Tested and fixed cross-browser compatibility issues for map application for Home Depot.
* Implementing web-based features using JavaScript framework Dojo Toolkit.
* Collaborate with international team members from US,Toronto and India.
* Great experience in an Agile  development environment


Web Master at Open Jaw Network (November 2011 - March 2012)
* Developed and maintained marketing pages for travel news website openjaw.com
* Created and maintained hyper-target email campaigns


Front-End Developer at Maclaren Maccan (October 2010 - October 2011)
* Developed standards-compliant HTML, CSS and JavaScript webpages,
  focusing on mobile and desktop 
* Created and developed high-end marketing webpage for GM.ca
* Created and maintained hyper-target email campaign for GM Canada using ExactTarget
* Great experience in an Agile  development environment


Web Developer at YESUP Media Inc (2009 - 2010)
* Developed and maintained marketing pages for flyercenter.com
* Published new content and perform site maintenance using WordPress


Freelance + Consultancy Services - Web Developer (2006 - 2009)
* Developed standards-compliant HTML, CSS and JavaScript webpages. 
* Worked directly with clients to create pixel-perfect webpages.
* Front-End and Back-End web development for individuals, small businesses.

### Education
2002-2005
Seneca College of Applied Arts & Technology
Computer Programming and Analysis Diploma

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
